page.title: 18CLUBS AND SOCIETIES-LEYBURN
page.content: SPORT:Association and Rugby Football,Badminton,Bowls,Cricket, Squash,Tennis. Also Darts, Snooker, Pool teams play in Public Houses. All teams take part in area friendly and league matches. SPECIAL INTEREST:Camera, Chess, Free Masons' Lodge, Natural History, Probus (Professional and Businessmen) Round Table, 41 Club, Ladies Circle and Tangent, Rotary and Inner Wheel, Women's Institute, Wensleydale Wives, Gilbert & Sullivan, Amateur Dramatics, Dancing Club (modern and old-time, country). There are also the following charitable and aiding groups:- Arthritis Research, Citizens Advice, Cancer Research, Tourist Board, Quarriers(elderly residents home support) Rural Adult Training Centre for the Mentally Handicapped.
